title: doc: /ref/cmd is out of place, mentions non-Go1 tools
body:
/ref/cmd seems strange next to /ref/spec and /ref/mem.
It is not that kind of documentation, nor does it link to that
kind of documentation.  It seems like it would be better to
get a header inserted atop /cmd/ instead.

Also, and more significantly, /ref/cmd/ mentions prof and cov,
neither of which will be part of Go 1.

I am not at all convinced this page carries its weight.
If we want to add a header to /cmd/ let's do that.
